name: nuclide-clang
description: Exposes features from nuclide-clang in Atom
author: NEEDS OWNER

libclangPath.title: libclang Library Path
libclangPath.description: Path to libclang.{so, dylib, dll} on your system. (Local projects only)

enableDefaultFlags.title: Enable Default Compilation Flags
enableDefaultFlags.description: Attempt to use Clang with *Default Compilation Flags* if they cannot be determined via Buck or `compile_commands.json`.

defaultFlags.title: Default Compilation Flags
defaultFlags.description: List of default flags to use with Clang, if enabled.

defaultDiagnostics.title: Enable Diagnostics With Default Flags
defaultDiagnostics.description: Enable diagnostics even while using default flags. May lead to inaccurate results.

serverProcessMemoryLimit.title: Clang server process memory limit
serverProcessMemoryLimit.description: Total memory usage of all clang server processes may not exceed this percentage of total memory.
